#: List of all the extractors available

transfur.#: Sets gallery-dvk to write JSON metadata for pages downloaded from Transfur.com
Sets the path to the download archive for Transfur
Sets the Username and Password for login to Transfur.com
Overrides the default include values to include favorites when downloading from a Transfur user
Overrides the default filename format to include the page date and ID
